org.ogcs.utilities.astar

类 AStarAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ogcs.utilities.astar.AStarAlgorithm

  • public final class AStarAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    A* 算法工具

    实现经典的曼哈顿权值算法, 算法中同一节点的H值为固定的

         
         F=H+G => G越小，路径越短
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    TinyZ

    • 方法详细资料

      • find

        public static java.util.LinkedList<Point> find(int x1,
                                               int y1,
                                               int x2,
                                               int y2,
                                               int[][] blocks)
        A* search algorithm
        参数:
        x1 - start point x coordinate
        y1 - start point y coordinate
        x2 - end point x coordinate
        y2 - end point y coordinate
        blocks - the tiled map blocks info.
        返回:
        Return the shortest path from start point to end point. otherwise return empty list.

      • find

        public static java.util.LinkedList<Point> find(int x1,
                                               int y1,
                                               int x2,
                                               int y2,
                                               int[][] blocks,
                                               boolean allowDiagonals)
        A* search algorithm
        参数:
        x1 - start point x coordinate
        y1 - start point y coordinate
        x2 - end point x coordinate
        y2 - end point y coordinate
        blocks - the tiled map blocks info.
        allowDiagonals - is allow diagonal.
        返回:
        Return the shortest path from start point to end point. otherwise return empty list.
